title: campaign
description: A Campaign is a grouping of adversary behavior that describes a set of malicious activities or attacks that occur over a period of time against a specific set of targets.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `campaign`.

name.description: The name used to identify the Campaign.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Campaign, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

aliases.description: Alternative names used to identify this campaign.

first_seen.description: The time that this Campaign was first seen.

last_seen.description: The time that this Campaign was last seen.
